group_1.textRight: What are you planning, getting us alone@together?
You're not going to hurt me, are you?

group_1.textLeft: N-never! I just wanted to talk to you…

group_1.textRight: Without even considering how I feel about that?
You're so self-centered.
Nothing a Magical Girl says is worth listening to.

group_1.textLeft: *Whimper*
(…Rabi was right.)
(We might never get to go back to bein' able@to talk like we used to…)
(…But.)
…Not as a Magical Girl, but as a human being…
I wanna talk to you as Urara Yume, y'know?

group_1.textRight: And tell me "I want to bring our duo back@together so I can support my poor family?"

group_1.textLeft: That's not what I was gonna say at all!

group_1.textRight: …Then make it quick.@I've got work after this.

group_1.textLeft: Okay…
I'm really, really sorry about what happened…
Because I was careless,@I didn't save that many people.
And I ended up hurtin' you too…
Still, I want you to know…
I…think of you as my best friend, see?
I love you, so…@I don't wanna lose you!
That's why… At the very least, I'd like us to be@able to talk casually…

group_1.textRight: …Honestly, you're totally oblivious to everything@around you, and selfish to the end.
That's the kind of thing I've always hated@about you.

group_1.textLeft: …Huh?

group_1.textRight: Do you have ANY idea how hard I've had@to practice...
to keep up with someone as naturally gifted@as you?

group_1.textLeft: Of course I know you're a hard worker.
That's why we practiced so much,
so we could pull off tough tricks together@as soon as possible…

group_1.textRight: You're a prodigy who can copy me in a snap,@always rushing me along.
I know you're not doing this on purpose,@but that's not why you piss me off.
…It was nice to be able to work with a natural@like you and make a name for myself.
Tickets sold like hotcakes.
I even managed to win a competition that@I never would've been able to enter alone.
But I've always been the "Not-Urara"…
You can't BEGIN to imagine what it was like@to stand next to you.
Especially since you're always shining so bright.
The way you butted in here today is proof@of that, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: I-I didn't mean to…!

group_1.textRight: "Best friends?"@"Irreplaceable?"
Don't make me laugh.

group_1.textLeft: I-I'm really sorry…
I just…wanted to reach an understanding…

group_1.textRight: …I knew you always loved me, even though@I'm like this.
And I know I'm a piece of shit too, for cursing@you for saving my life…

group_1.textLeft: Kurara…

group_1.textRight: But I can't do this anymore.
As long as I'm with you,
I'll be reminded of how ugly my own heart is.
Breaking up the duo was a good thing,
regardless of whether or not you became@a Magical Girl, isn't that right?

group_1.textLeft: …Don't say that…

group_1.textRight: I used to rely on you, but from now on, I'm@gonna climb to the top with my own strength.
So…don't involve yourself with me anymore.
Goodbye.
